repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: Donald W. Cameron, originally from Milford, Connecticut, attended the University of Connecticut from 1953-1957 and is the author of the manuscript "Prologue to the Twenty-first Century."

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Donald W. Cameron, originally from Milford, Connecticut, attended the University of Connecticut from 1953-1957 and is the author of the manuscript "Prologue to the Twenty-first Century." While at the University he was a member of the Lambda Chi Alpha,Tau Beta Pi, Tau Pi Sigma, American Society of Mechanical Engineers, the Congregational Choir and the varsity swim team. Mr. Cameron graduated with a degree in Industrial Mechanical Engineering.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a bound, manuscript copy of Cameron's "Prologue to the Twenty-first Century." Bound with the manuscript is an unedited letter to Mr. Cameron's grandson, Geoffrey.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Donald W. Cameron Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The manuscript was donated by Mr. Raol Wolf, a fraternity brother, in September 2010.
